articles.description: Richard Gere and his wife, Alejandra Silva, have welcomed their second son, a rep for the actor confirms to CNN.
articles.content:
(CNN)Richard Gere and his wife, Alejandra Silva, have welcomed their second son, a rep for the actor confirms to CNN.
Gere, 70 and Silva, 37, already have 14-month-old Alexander. Gere also has a 20-year-old son from a previous marriage. Silva has a son with … [+419 chars]

articles.title: Juice WRLD's Posthumous Track 'Righteous' Details Drug Use - TMZ
articles.description: Juice WRLD's family has dropped a new track, "Righteous," which foreshadowed his drug problem.
articles.content:
Juice WRLD's family has dropped a posthumous track from him, and its lyrics sadly foreshadow his eventual demise.
The late rapper's family dropped "Righteous" Thursday night and the track goes into extreme detail about his heavy drug use and the state of his… [+1220 chars]

articles.title: Eminem donates "mom's spaghetti" to Detroit health care workers - CBS News
articles.description: "Our #HealthcareHeroes 'lost themselves' in the delicious Mom's Spaghetti," the hospital said
articles.content: Eminem is looking out for health care workers on the frontlines of the coronavirus battle in his hometown of Detroit, and he's doing it in his own unique way. Paying homage to a line in his 2002 hit "Lose Yourself," the rapper sent his "mom's spaghetti" to em… [+1936 chars]

articles.title: Royal outrage: How US President shocked the Queen Mother with kiss on the lips - Express
articles.description: THE QUEEN MOTHER was left in shock when former US President Jimmy Carter greeted her with a kiss on the lips in 1977, unearthed reports reveal.

articles.description: Bronx rapper Fred the Godson died Thursday after contracting COVID-19, according to multiple reports.

articles.author: Analysis by Brian Lowry, CNN
articles.title: 'Avengers: Endgame' premiered a year ago. A whole lot has changed since then - CNN
articles.description: The Marvel blockbuster premiered one year ago, on April 26, 2019, although just imagining people crowding into theaters, it surely feels a whole lot longer. The movie went on to amass $2.8 billion worldwide, surpassing the benchmark set by "Avatar."
articles.content: (CNN)With what felt like a snap, "Avengers: Endgame" shattered opening-weekend box-office records, earning $357 million in North America -- roughly $100 million more than its predecessor. The movie went on to amass $2.8 billion worldwide, surpassing the bench… [+3766 chars]
